sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Tracker.css"; import * as ReactBootStrap from "react-bootstrap"; class Tracker extends Component { state = { profile: "Lil_Kha1998", platform: "psn", segmentType: "legend", damagePathfinder: {}, damageWraith: {}, damageBangalore: {}, damageMirage: {}, damageCaustic: {}, damageGibralter: {}, damageLoba: {}, damageLifeline: {}, damageBloodhound: {}, damageCrypto: {}, damageWattson: {}, damageOctane: {}, rankedLevel: {}, loaded: true, rankData:{} }; onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); Promise.all([fetch( `http://localhost:5000/api/v1/rank/${this.state.platform}/${this.state.profile}` ), fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/v1/profile/${this.state.platform}/${this.state.profile}/${this.state.segmentType}` )]) .then(([res,res2]) => ( { res: res.json(), res2:res.json(), })) .then((res,res2) => this.setState({ damagePathfinder: res.data.data[0].stats.kills, damageWraith: res.data.data[1].stats.kills, damageBangalore: res.data.data[2].stats.kills, damageMirage: res.data.data[3].stats.kills, damageCaustic: res.data.data[4].stats.kills, damageGibralter: res.data.data[5].stats.kills, damageLoba: res.data.data[6].stats.kills, damageLifeline: res.data.data[7].stats.kills, damageBloodhound: res.data.data[8].stats.kills, damageCrypto: res.data.data[9].stats.kills, rankedLevel: res.data, loaded: false, rankData:res2.data.data }) ) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); }; render() { //URL params const { profile, platform } = this.state; //Character kill values const { damagePathfinder, damageWraith, damageBangalore, damageMirage, damageCaustic, damageGibralter, damageLoba, damageLifeline, damageBloodhound, damageCrypto, rankedLevel, rankData, loaded, } = this.state; console.log(rankedLevel); console.log(rankData) return (

Stat Tracker





{loaded ? ( <>

{rankedLevel.value}

Pathfinder

Kills: {damagePathfinder.value}

Wraith

Kills: {damageWraith.value}

Bangalore

Kills: {damageBangalore.value}

Mirage

Kills: {damageMirage.value}

Caustic

Kills: {damageCaustic.value}

Gibralter

Kills: {damageGibralter.value}

Loba

Kills: {damageLoba.value}

Lifeline

Kills: {damageLifeline.value}

Bloodhound

Kills: {damageBloodhound.value}

Crypto

Kills: {damageCrypto.value}

{/*

Rank

{rankData.platformUserId}

*/} ) : ( )}

*If badge is not applied on charactor card stats wont appear

); } } export default Tracker;
